name.ja: フェニックス・ギア・ブレード

text.en: Equip only to a Warrior or FIRE monster. It gains 300 ATK. If the equipped monster attacked, at the end of the Damage Step: You can send this card to the GY; each of your Warrior and FIRE monsters can make a second attack during this Battle Phase. If this card is sent to the GY, or banished, to activate a monster effect: You can add this card to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Phoenix Gearblade" once per turn.
